title: Create Algorand Standard Asset (ASA)
summary: Create a new Algorand Standard Asset with full configuration including metadata and roles.
source_code:
import { AlgorandClient } from '@algorandfoundation/algokit-utils'

async function main() {
  console.log('=== Create Algorand Standard Asset (ASA) ===\n')

  const algorand = AlgorandClient.defaultLocalNet()
  const creator = await algorand.account.fromEnvironment('CREATOR', (10).algo())

  console.log('Creating asset...')
  const createResult = await algorand.send.assetCreate({
    sender: creator.addr,
    total: 1000000n,
    decimals: 2,
    assetName: 'My Token',
    unitName: 'MYT',
    url: 'https://example.com',
    manager: creator.addr,
    reserve: creator.addr,
    freeze: creator.addr,
    clawback: creator.addr,
  })

  console.log('Asset created!')
  console.log('  Asset ID:', createResult.assetId)
  console.log('  Transaction ID:', createResult.txIds[0])
  console.log('')

  const assetInfo = await algorand.asset.getById(createResult.assetId)
  console.log('Asset information:')
  console.log('  Name:', assetInfo.assetName)
  console.log('  Unit:', assetInfo.unitName)
  console.log('  Total:', assetInfo.total)
  console.log('  Decimals:', assetInfo.decimals)
  console.log('  Manager:', assetInfo.manager)

  console.log('\n=== Complete ===')
}

main().catch(console.error)

title: TEAL Template Variables
summary: Use template variables in TEAL code for parameterized smart contracts.
source_code:
import { performTemplateSubstitution } from '@algorandfoundation/algokit-utils'

async function main() {
  console.log('=== TEAL Template Variables ===\n')

  const tealCode = `#pragma version 8
txn ApplicationID
int 0
==
bnz create

// Check updatable
int TMPL_UPDATABLE
int 0
==
assert

// Check value
int TMPL_VALUE
int 42
==
assert

create:
int 1
return`

  console.log('Original TEAL with template variables:')
  console.log(tealCode, '\n')

  console.log('Substituting template variables...')
  const substituted = performTemplateSubstitution(tealCode, {
    UPDATABLE: 0,
    VALUE: 42,
  })

  console.log('\\nSubstituted TEAL:')
  console.log(substituted, '\n')

  console.log('Template variables replaced:')
  console.log('  TMPL_UPDATABLE -> 0')
  console.log('  TMPL_VALUE -> 42')

  console.log('\n=== Complete ===')
  console.log('Template variables allow parameterized smart contracts')
}

main().catch(console.error)
